Package org.cpnsim.request

Class InstanceGroupSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.request.InstanceGroupSimple
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeableId, Identifiable, InstanceGroup, RequestEntity
public class InstanceGroupSimple extends Object implements InstanceGroup
InstanceGroupSimple is a simple implementation of the InstanceGroup interface.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

  • Constructor Details

    • InstanceGroupSimple

      public InstanceGroupSimple(int id)
      Create an instance group with the specified id. The instances in the instance group are initially empty.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the instance group.

    • InstanceGroupSimple

      public InstanceGroupSimple(int id, List<Instance> instances)
      Create an instance group with the specified id and instances.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the instance group.
      instances - the instances in the instance group.

    • isSetDestDatacenter

      public boolean isSetDestDatacenter()
      Description copied from interface: InstanceGroup
      We can initially set the ID of the target data center to which the instance group needs to be scheduled. If it is set, the system does not need to find the data center to be scheduled for the instance group. Get whether the target data center to which the instance group needs to be scheduled is set.
      Specified by:
      isSetDestDatacenter in interface InstanceGroup
      Returns:
      whether the target data center to which the instance group needs to be scheduled is set.

    • addRetryNum

      public InstanceGroup addRetryNum()
      Description copied from interface: InstanceGroup
      Add the number of retries for the instance group. If the number of retries exceeds the maximum number of retries, the instance group is marked as failed.
      Specified by:
      addRetryNum in interface InstanceGroup
      Returns:
      the instance group itself.
      See Also:
      • They are similar.

    • isFailed

      public boolean isFailed()
      Description copied from interface: InstanceGroup
      Get whether the instance group is marked as failed which means the state of the instance group is UserRequest.FAILED.
      Specified by:
      isFailed in interface InstanceGroup
      Returns:
      whether the instance group is marked as failed.

    • addSuccessInstanceNum

      public InstanceGroup addSuccessInstanceNum()
      Description copied from interface: InstanceGroup
      Add the number of instances that have been successfully scheduled. If all the instances in the instance group have been successfully scheduled, the instance group is marked as success.
      Specified by:
      addSuccessInstanceNum in interface InstanceGroup
      Returns:
      the instance group itself.

    • isNetworkLimited

      public boolean isNetworkLimited()
      Description copied from interface: InstanceGroup
      Get whether the instance group has network limitations, that is, whether there are access delay limitations, and whether there are limitations on renting bandwidth and network connection delays with other instance groups.
      Specified by:

      whether the instance group has network restrictions.
